reasoning_log: The matching process involved identifying key functional areas (Living/Dining, Kitchen, Bathrooms, Bedrooms, Utility areas) first. The three Master Bedroom descriptions (Desc_4, Desc_5, Desc_6) were confirmed to correspond to the three distinct angles of the same highly decorated bedroom (Image_4, Image_5, Image_6), based on the presence of the unique wood feature wall and built-in cabinetry/desk. The two bathrooms were differentiated by the dry/wet separation feature: Desc_7 requires 'good dry/wet separation' and an 'external window', matching Image_7 (glass enclosure and window). Desc_3 requires 'dry/wet not fully separated' and 'wooden ceiling', matching Image_3 (wooden ceiling, no glass enclosure visible). The three secondary rooms (Desc_8, Desc_9, Desc_10) were matched based on specific window types and built-in features (low cabinet in Image_8, corner window in Image_9, proximity to entrance in Image_10). The utility areas (parking and entrance) were straightforward matches.

matching_result_list.evidence: Image shows an open-plan living and dining area (客餐廳) with modern furniture, ample storage, and new marble-look flooring, confirming '開放格局' and '地坪新穎'.
Image displays a modern, separate kitchen (獨立廚房) with white cabinets, a cooktop area ('完整瓦斯爐具'), and a door/window suggesting connection to a rear balcony ('後陽台連通').
This bathroom features a wooden ceiling and floating vanity ('懸空浴櫃', '木質天花設計'). Crucially, there is no glass enclosure, supporting the tag '乾濕未完全分離'.
First angle of the master bedroom, showing the large bed, built-in white wardrobes, and wood feature wall ('內建衣櫃', '裝潢新穎').
Second angle of the master bedroom, clearly showing the window providing '採光良好' and the integrated desk/work area separate from the bed ('休息與工作區分明').
Third angle of the master bedroom, highlighting the extensive white wardrobe space ('衣櫃量充足') and the desk/workspace ('書桌工作台') positioned near the side window.
This bathroom features a glass shower enclosure ('乾濕分離佳'), an external window, and a wooden ceiling/feature wall ('木質天花與造型牆').
Secondary room with a large bay window and a low, built-in storage cabinet beneath it ('低檯度收納櫃'). The room is rectangular and bright.
Secondary room characterized by a corner window providing '採光充足' and a spacious, empty '矩形格局'.
Secondary room with a single window and a doorway visible on the left, suggesting it is '靠近公共區'. It is a simple '矩形空間' with white walls.
Image shows an indoor parking space ('室內停車') with concrete columns near the side and visible wear/aging on the structure ('牆面有老舊痕跡').
Image captures a community entrance with a green metal structure acting as a '遮雨棚設計', tiled pavement, and a view into a landscaped '中庭綠化'.
